text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 223366009 (Healthcare professional)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 307988006 (Medical technician)

name: PractitionerRole
title: Practitioner Role
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.
